step.cmd: Locate the Upper Sub (C1) and use a Cloth Sling and the hoist to orient it vertically so that it is resting on its box thread end. Stabilize the Upper Sub (C1).
Apply Silicon Moly Blend or Pro-Long EP2 Plus grease to the threads located immediately below the seal grooves.
Gather the Locking Segments (C5) and apply moderate Silicon Moly Blend or Pro-Long EP2 Plus grease.

note.p: The Silicon Moly Blend or Pro-Long EP2 Plus grease will keep the Locking Segments (C5) in place during the remaining assembly process.

step.cmd: The Silicon Moly Blend or Pro-Long EP2 Plus grease will keep the Locking Segments (C5) in place during the remaining assembly process.
Locate the Retaining Ring (C4). Apply Silicon Moly Blend or Pro-Long EP2 Plus grease to its ID threads.
Use the hoist and a Cloth Sling to lower the Retaining Ring (C4) onto the Upper Sub (C1).
Allow the Retaining Ring (C4) to rest upon the shoulder of the Upper Sub (C1), see figure below.
